content.about: Life is just one big loop. You wake up, go about your day, sleep, and then do it all over again. The days blur together, time moves forward whether we want it to or not, and no matter how much we try to make things feel meaningful, it all just fades eventually. People come and go, memories that once felt unshakable start to disappear, and in the end, we're all just tiny, forgettable pieces of something too big to care about us. No matter how much we build, create, or love, the world keeps spinning like we were never here at all. But while we're all stuck in this endless cycle, I make Minecraft videos and music to entertain you. So, at least there's that.
